title: Blawpaw
author: Blawpaw
content: I'm looking for some extra work to get an additional income. I do have some experience, so I would accept pretty much anything, You name it! From writing onto forum posting and forum moderation, translation and transcription, Virtual assistance, and Customer support, I'm your guy.Hit me with a PM in case you need someone working for you!

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Fiverr and Upwork for VA and Customer Support.Rev, TranscribeMe, GoTranscript for transcription.These websites might help you get your online job. If you're good at transcribing, you might get accepted on the websites I shared. Maybe posting some of your previous works might attract some clients/users here .

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Hi can i join this cause i need extra income too

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on July 18, 2022, 04:58:39 AMHi can i join this cause i need extra income too If you are looking for work too, then better start your own new thread in the services section by mentioning your details, expertise, experience, and most importantly, your portfolio.  This way you will have more chances to be hired.Leave this thread for Blawpaw

comments.author: Naficopa
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on July 18, 2022, 03:25:15 PMQuote from: dansus021 on July 18, 2022, 04:58:39 AMHi can i join this cause i need extra income too If you are looking for work too, then better start your own new thread in the services section by mentioning your details, expertise, experience, and most importantly, your portfolio.  This way you will have more chances to be hired.Leave this thread for Blawpaw  did you manage to find some work? Try creating a fiverr profile or upwork profile  - In fiverr many customers display their requests and you can send your offers and grab some work - good luck
